CustomField.description: This field tracks the zoom meeting attendance status. Make sure Event's Zoom Meeting Attendance's picklists values aligned with this field api name to make status reflect as expected.The sync will work only if the API name is provided in this field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is the child objects status field api name to track the zoom meeting attendance status.Make sure Event's Zoom Meeting Attendance's picklists values aligned with this field to reflect the status as expected.
CustomField.label: Attendance Status Field Api Name
